content: अरुंतुद {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अरूंषि मर्माणि तुदति; अरुस्-तुद्, खश् मुमागमश्च <ls>P. III. 2. 35</ls>; <ls n="P.">VI. 3. 67</ls>] {@--1@} Cutting or wounding the vital parts, inflicting wounds, corrosive, painful, sharp (<ab>fig.</ab> also); caustic; अरुंतुदमिवालानमनिर्वाणस्य दंतिनः <ls>R. 1. 71</ls>; <ls>Ki. 14. 55</ls>; <ls>Śi. 2. 109.</ls> {@--2@} Acrimonious, sour (disposition); <ls>Ms. 2. 161.</ls>
